juzs.text: He said: you messengers, so what is your business
They said: we were sent to a group of guilty ones
so that we send upon them stones of clay
marked by your Master for the excessive ones
So We brought out anyone who was among the believers in it
But We only found a house of the submitted ones in it
And We left a sign in it for those who fear the painful punishment
And in (the story of) Moses when We sent him to Pharaoh with a clear authorization
Then he turned away with his base (of supporters) and said: a magician or a madman
So We took him and his troops, then We threw them in the sea, and he was to blame
And in (the story of) Aad when We sent upon them the destructive wind
It did not leave anything that it came upon it, except making it as the decomposed thing
And (the story of) Thamud when they were told: enjoy yourselves for a while
Then they rebelled against their Master’s command, so the thunderbolt took them while they were looking
Then they could not stand up and they could not take revenge (or defend)
And people of Noah in the past, indeed they were disobedient people
We built the sky with Our power and We are certainly expanding (it)
And We spread out the earth, and how good We spread out
And We created pairs of everything, so you may take notice
So run away to God. Indeed I am a clear warner for you from Him
And do not set up another god with God. Indeed I am a clear warner for you from Him
Likewise, no messenger came to those before them unless they said: a magician or a madman
Did they recommend (one another) to it? No, they are rebellious people
So turn away from them, you are not to blame
And (continue to) remind, as indeed the reminder benefits the believers
And I did not create Jinn and humans except to serve Me (and no one else)
I do not want any provision from them and I do not want them to feed Me
Indeed God is the provider having the power and the definitive strength
So indeed there are shares (of punishment) for those who did wrong same as shares of their companions, so they should not ask Me to rush
So woe to those who disbelieved from their day that they are promised
By the mountain (Mount Sinai)
and by a written book
in unrolled scroll
and by the thriving (and frequented) house
and by the raised roof
and by the blazing (and swollen) sea
your Master’s punishment is certainly a reality
No one (and nothing) can repel it
A day when the sky swings back and forth
and the mountains move about, traveling
woe to the deniers on that day
those playing around in useless talk
A day when they are forcefully pushed into fire of hell
This is the fire that you were denying it
So is this a magic or you do not see
Enter (and burn in) it, it is the same to you whether you are patient or you are not patient, you are only penalized for what you used to do
Indeed those who control themselves are in gardens and in happiness
Enjoying because of what their Master gave them and that their Master protected them from punishment of the hellfire
Eat and drink joyfully because of what you were doing
Leaning on couches lined up in rows, and We marry them to appealing girls with beautiful eyes
And those who believed and their descendants who followed them in belief, We join their descendants with them and We do not reduce anything from their works. Every person is bound by what he did
And We help them with whatever fruit and meat they desire
They pass a cup to one another in there that there is nothing useless or sinful in it
And young male servants who are like hidden pearl go around them for (serving) them
And they turn to each other asking one another
they say: indeed we were afraid among our people in the past
but God favored upon us and protected us from the punishment of scorching wind
Indeed we used to call on Him in the past. Indeed He is the good, the merciful
So remind (them) that by your Master’s favor you are not a fortune-teller or a madman
Or do they say: a poet, we wait for his time of misfortune (his death)
Say: wait and I wait with you
Or does their imagination (and dreams) order them to this, or are they disobedient people
Or they say he made it up? No, but they do not believe
So let them bring a saying like it (Quran), if they are truthful
Or were they created from nothing, or are they the creators
Or did they create the skies and the earth? No, they are not certain
Or are the treasures of their Master with them, or are they in charge (of them)
Or do they have a ladder that they listen by it? Then their listeners should bring a clear reason
Or does He have the daughters and you have the sons
Or do you ask them for a wage, and they are weighed down by the debt
Or is the unseen with them, and they write it
Or do they want to plot? But those who disbelieved are plotted against
Or do they have a god other than God? God is flawless of what they associate (with Him)
And if they see a piece of the sky falling down, they say: piled up clouds
So leave them until they meet their day, in which they are thunderstruck (and die)
A day that their plot is of no use to them at all, and they are not helped
And indeed for those who did wrong there is a punishment other than this, but most of them do not know
And be patient for your Master’s command, as you are under Our eyes, and glorify your Master with praise when you get up
And glorify Him part of the night and when the stars disappear
By the star when it goes down
your companion is not misguided and he was not deceived
And he does not speak from the desire
It (Quran) is not but a revelation that is revealed
The very powerful (Gabriel) taught him
being strong, he stood firmly
And he was at the higher horizon
then he came closer and he came down
until he was at a distance of two bows or closer
then he revealed to His servant what he revealed
His (the prophet’s) heart did not deny what he saw
Do you argue with him about what he sees
And he has certainly seen him in another descent
By the Lote (Sidra) tree at the utmost boundary
Next to it is garden of the residence
When that which covers covered the Lote (Sidra) tree
The eye did not turn aside and did not outreach
He has certainly seen some of the great signs of His Master
What do you think of the Lat, the Uzza
and Manat, the third one (of them)
Are the males for you and the females for Him
That is an unfair division

They are only names which you and your fathers named it, whereas God did not send down any reason for it? They only follow the guess and what the souls desires, while the guidance has certainly come to them from their Master
Or does the human being have whatever he desire
While the last (the hereafter) and the first (this world) belongs to God
And many angels are in the skies, that their mediation is of no benefit at all except after God gives permission for whom He wants and He approves
Indeed those who do not believe in the hereafter shall name the angels the feminine names
while they have no knowledge of it, they only the follow guesswork, and guesswork is of no use against the truth at all
So stay away from anyone who turns away from Our reminder and only wants this world’s life
That is their extent of the knowledge. Indeed your Master knows better anyone who lost His way and He knows better anyone who is guided

And whatever in the skies and whatever on the earth belongs to God, so that He penalizes those who did bad in what they did and to reward those who did good with the better (reward than what they did)

those who avoid the big sins and the indecencies except the small ones. Your Master is vast in the forgiveness. He knows better about you, when He produced you from the earth and when you were hidden (as embryos) in your mothers’ wombs. So do not claim yourselves pure (and innocent), as He knows better who controls himself
Did you see the one who turned away
and gave a little and was stingy
Does he have knowledge of the unseen, so he sees
Or was he not informed of what is in scriptures of Moses
and Abraham, the one who fulfilled (his duties)
That no bearer bears burden of another
and that there is not (any reward) for the human being except what he tried for
And that his efforts will be seen
then he is rewarded with the full reward
And that the final ending is to your Master
And that He is he who makes (everyone) laugh and cry
And He is he who causes death and gives life
And that He created the two types, the male and the female
from sperm when it is ejected
And that the other creation is His responsibility
And that He is he who makes rich and makes poor (or gives property)
And that He is he who is Master of the Sirius (the brightest star at night)
And that He destroyed the earlier Aad
and Thamud, and He did not leave (anyone alive)
And (He destroyed) people of Noah before (them), indeed they were more wrongdoer and more rebellious
And He overthrew the turned over cities
and it was covered by what covers
So which of your Master's favors do you doubt
This is a warner like the previous warners
The upcoming (judgment day) is coming up
No one other than God can expose it
Are you surprised by this saying
and you laugh and you do not cry
and you are negligent
So show humbleness to God and serve Him
The hour gets close and the moon splits
And if they see a miracle they turn away and say: a continuous magic
And they denied, and followed their desires. And all matters have a settlement
And the news (of the earlier ones) have certainly come to them, that in which there is a deterrence
a perfect wisdom, but warnings are of no use
So stay away from them, a day (comes when) the caller calls them to a nasty thing
With their eyes looking down (in humiliation), they come out of their graves as if they were spreading locusts
Rushing toward the caller, the disbelievers say: this is a difficult day
People of Noah denied before them, and they denied Our servant (Noah) and they said a madman, and he was outcast
So he called on his Master: I am defeated, so help
So We opened the gates of the sky with downpour of water
And We gushed out springs from the earth. The waters joined for a matter that was destined (the flood)
And We carried him on (the Ark) having timbers and nails
It sailed under Our eyes, a reward for him who was rejected (Noah)
And We have certainly left it as a sign, so does anyone take notice
So how were My punishment and My warnings
And We have certainly made the Quran easy to understand, so does anyone take notice
Aad denied, so how were My punishment and My warnings
Indeed We sent a continuous ice cold wind upon them on a miserable day
knocking the people over as if they were uprooted trunks of a palm tree
So how were My punishment and My warnings
And We have certainly made the Quran easy to understand, so does anyone take notice
Thamud denied the warnings
And they said: should we follow him, a single human being among us? Then indeed we are in error and madness
Is the reminder only given to him among us? No, he is a rude liar
Tomorrow they are going to know who the rude liar is
Indeed We are senders of the female camel as a test for them, so watch them and be patient
And inform them that the water is shared between them, and each drinking is to be attended
But they called their companion, and he took (a knife) and killed (her)
So how were My punishment and My warnings
Indeed We sent a single awesome roar upon them and they became like dried broken straws of a barn maker
And We have certainly made the Quran easy to understand, so does anyone take notice
People of Lot denied the warnings
Indeed We sent a sandstorm upon them, except Lot’s family whom We saved them by dawn
a favor from Us. That is how We reward anyone who thanks
And he has certainly warned them of Our assault, but they doubted the warnings
And they have certainly demanded his guest from him, so We blinded their eyes, so taste My punishment and My warnings
And certainly a lasting punishment took them by early morning
So taste My punishment and My warnings
And We have certainly made the Quran easy to understand, so does anyone take notice
And the warners have certainly come to Pharaoh’s people
They denied all Our signs, so We took them (into punishment), a powerful and awesome taking
Are your disbelievers better than them, or is there immunity for you in the scriptures
Or do they say we are united and victorious
They are all going to be defeated and turn their backs (running away)
No, the hour is their appointment time, and the hour is more awful and bitterer (than this world’s punishment)
Indeed the guilty ones are in error and madness
A day when they are dragged into the fire on their faces (they are told): taste the touch of hell
Indeed We created everything in correct proportion
And Our command is only once, like a blink of an eye
And We have certainly destroyed your kinds, so does anyone take notice
And everything they did is in the books
And everything small or big is written
And indeed those who control themselves will be in gardens and rivers
In a seat of truth, with a mighty ruler
The beneficent
taught the Quran
created the human being
taught him the speech
The sun and the moon with precisely calculated (courses)
The herb (or the star) and the tree both humble themselves (before Him)
And He raised the sky and set up the balance
that you do not outdo the balance
And perform the weighing with justice and do not make the scale light
And He set up the earth for the human race
in it there are fruits and palm trees having coverings
and the seed having outer shell, and the fragrant herbs
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
He created the human being from dried clay like pottery clay
And He created the Jinn from flame of a fire
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Master of the two easts and Master of the two wests
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
He made the two seas flow freely to meet
there is a barrier between them that they do not go beyond
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Pearl and coral comes out of both of them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
And the sailing ships raised in the sea like the mountains/road signs belong to Him
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Everyone on it (the earth) is mortal
while your Master's essence, having the majesty and the nobility remains (forever)
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Everyone in the skies and on the earth ask Him (for their needs). Every day He is in some affair
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
We are going to attend to you, the two important beings (humans and Jinn)
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
You, group of Jinn and humans, if you can cross the boundaries of the skies and the earth then cross. You cannot cross except with an authorization
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
A flame of fire and melted copper will be sent upon both of you, and you cannot help/defend yourselves
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
And when the sky splits and it becomes red like the red rawhide (or red hot oil)
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
On that day no human being or Jinn is asked about his sin
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
The guilty ones are recognized by their appearance, then they are taken by (the hair lock of) the forehead and the feet
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
This is hell that the guilty ones deny it
They go around between it and between hot boiling water
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
And there are two gardens for anyone who fears his Master’s position
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Two (gardens) having a variety (of trees)
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
There are two springs flowing in both of them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
There are pairs of every fruits in both of them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Leaning on cushions/beds inside of which is from heavy silk, and fruits of the two gardens are within reach
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
And there are girls with restrained glances in them whom no human being or Jinn had sex with them before them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
They are like the ruby and the coral
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Is reward of the goodness anything except goodness
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
And beside those two are two (other) gardens
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Both dark green (because of lush vegetation)
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
There are two springs gushing out in both of them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
There are fruits and date and pomegranate in both of them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
There are good and beautiful females in both of them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Appealing girls restricted in the pavilions
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
No human being or Jinn had sex with them before them
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Leaning on green pillows and fine colorful carpets
Then which of your Master’s favors do you deny
Blessed is the name of your Master, having the majesty and the nobility
When the event happens
and its happening is not false
it is lowering and elevating (humiliating and honoring)
When the earth is violently shaken
and the mountains are totally disintegrated
and become scattered dust
And you will be three types
The associates of happiness (the fortunate people). Who are the fortunate people
The associates of misery (the unfortunate people). Who are the unfortunate people
And the pioneers (in devotion) are the pioneers (in the hereafter)
They are the close ones (to God)
in gardens of delight
A large number of the earlier ones
and a few from the later ones
On sofas lavishly decorated (with jewels and gold)
reclining on them, facing each other
Immortal youths circulate among them
with drinking glasses and jugs and cups of spring water
They do not get headache and they do not get exhausted (and drunk) from it
And from whatever fruits they choose
and from whatever meat of birds they desire
and appealing girls with beautiful eyes
like the hidden pearl (inside the shell)
as a reward for what they used to do
They do not hear useless or sinful (talk) in it
except a saying of peace (and well-being), peace (and well-being)
And the associates of the right hand (the fortunate), who are the fortunate
Among thorn free Lote (Sidra) tree
and banana trees piled up (with fruits)
and extended shade
and flowing water
and plenty of fruits
not ending and not forbidden
And dignified spouses
whom We created them perfectly
and We made them virgins
devoted (and loving), of equal age
for associates of the right hand (the fortunate)
a large number of the earlier ones
and a large number of the later ones
And associates of the left hand (the unfortunate), who are the unfortunate
In scorching wind and boiling water
and shade of thick (black) smoke
not cool and not nice
Indeed they were rich (and wealthy) before this
and they insisted on the great sin
and they used to say: would we be raised when we die and become dust and bones
Or our forefathers
Say: indeed the earlier ones and the later ones
are certainly collected at an appointment of a known day
Then indeed you, the misguided deniers
are certainly eaters of Zaqqum tree
and filling the stomachs from it
then drinking boiling water over it
and drinking as thirsty camels drink
This is their entertainment on the judgment day
We created you, so why do you not acknowledge
What do you think of what you ejaculate
Do you create it or are We the creators
We mandated the death among you, and We will not be surpassed
in replacing (you with) the likes of you and producing you in (a form) that you do not know
You have certainly known about the first creation, so why do you not take notice
What do you think of what you plant
Do you grow it, or are We the growers
If We want, We make it into broken pieces, and leave you wondering
(saying): we certainly suffered losses
no, but we are deprived
What do you think of the water that you drink
Did you send it down from the cloud, or are We the senders
If We want, We make it bitter (and salty), so why are you not thankful
What do you think of the fire that you light
Did you make its tree, or are We the makers
We made it a reminder and a provision for those living/traveling in the desert
So glorify the name of your great Master
So I swear by positions of the stars
and it is a great oath if you knew
indeed this is a noble Quran
in a concealed book
none touch it except the purified ones
a sending down from the Master of Human kind
Do you take this saying lightly
and you make it your livelihood to deny it
So why not when it (life) reaches the throat
and you are watching at that moment
while We are closer to him than you but you do not see
then if you are not obligated, why don't
you return it (the soul to the body), if you are truthful
But if he is one of the close ones (to God)
then ease and comfort and gardens of delight (are for him)
And if he is among associates of the right hand (the fortunate)
then peace (and well-being) for you among associates of the right hand
And if he is among the misguided deniers
then entertainment of boiling water
and entering (and burning in) hellfire (is for him)
And this is indeed the sure truth
So glorify the name of your great Master
Everything in the skies and the earth glorifies God, and He is the powerful, the wise
Rule of the skies and the earth belongs to Him, He gives life and causes death, and He is capable of everything
He is the first and the last, and the obvious and the obscure, and He knows everything

He is the One who created the skies and the earth in six stages and then He settled on the throne. He knows whatever goes into the earth and whatever comes out of it, and whatever comes down from the sky and whatever that goes up to it, and He is with you wherever you are, and God sees whatever you do
Rule of the skies and the earth belongs to Him, and the affairs are returned to God
He makes the night pass through the day and makes the day pass through the night. And He knows what is inside the chests (your intentions)
Believe in God and His messenger and spend (in God's way) from what He made you successors in it. There is a great reward for those of you who believed and spent (in God's way)
What is with you that you don’t believe in God while the messenger calls you to believe in your Master? And He has certainly taken your commitment if you are believer
He is the One who sends down clear signs to His servant in order to bring you out of the darkness into the light. And God is indeed gentle and merciful to you

And what is with you that you do not spend in God’s way, while the inheritance of the skies and the earth belongs to God? Those of you who spent and fought before the victory are not equal (with those who did that later). They have greater rank than those who spent and fought afterward, while God promised the goodness to all (of them). And God is well informed of what you do
And who is he that lends God a good loan (or who is he that offers God a good deed) so that He multiplies it for him, and there is a noble (and generous) reward for him

A day when you see the believing men and the believing women rushing with their lights ahead of them and to the right of them (they will be told): today your good news is gardens that rivers flow through them, remaining in there forever. That is the great victory

A day when the hypocrite men and the hypocrite women say to those who believed: look at us that we may get some of your light. It is said: go back to your past and look for a light. And a wall having a gate is put up between them, its interior has mercy in it while its exterior has the punishment facing it

They (the disbelievers) call on them (the believers): were we not with you? they say: yes, but you tempted yourselves and you waited and you doubted, and wishful thinking deceived you until God’s command came and the deceiver (Satan) deceived you about God
So today no ransom is taken from you and from those who disbelieved, your housing is the fire, it is your sponsor and it is a bad destination

Is it not about time for those who believed to humble their hearts for God’s remembrance and what came down from the truth, and do not be like those who were given the book in the past, and then after some time passed for them their hearts hardened and many of them were disobedient
Know that God brings the earth back to life after its death. We certainly made the signs clear for you, so that you may understand
The charitable men and the charitable women and those who lend God a good loan (or offer God a good deed), it (their reward) is multiplied for them and a noble (and generous) reward is for them

And those who believed in God and His messenger, they are the truthful and witnesses before their Master, they have their reward and their light. And those who disbelieved and denied Our signs, they are inhabitants of the hellfire

Know that this world’s life is only play and amusement, and decoration and show off among yourselves, and wanting more in the wealth and the children. It is like the example of a rain that its plant growth impresses the farmers, then it dries up and you see it turn yellow and then becomes broken pieces. And in the hereafter there is severe punishment (for the disbelievers) and forgiveness and pleasure of God (for the believers). And this world’s life is only means of the deception

Race to forgiveness of your Master, and a garden whose width is as wide as the sky and the earth, and is prepared for those who believed in God and His messengers. That is God’s grace that He gives it to anyone He wants. And God has enormous grace
No tragedy happens on the earth or within yourselves unless it is in a book before We create it (according to God's laws). This is easy for God
So that you do not be sad over what slips away from you (or what you lose) and not to be overjoyed about what He gives you. And God does not like any selfish show off
those who are stingy and order people to the stinginess. And anyone who turns back, God is indeed the rich (without any need) and the praiseworthy

We have certainly sent Our messengers with clear proofs, and sent down the book and the balance (of right and wrong) with them so that people carry out justice. And We sent down the iron in which there is a great badness and benefits for the people, and for God to know anyone who helps Him and His messenger in the secret. God is indeed strong and powerful
And We have certainly sent Noah and Abraham and We put the prophethood and the book among their descendants, so some of them were guided, and most of them were disobedient

Then We followed them up with Our messengers, and We sent Jesus son of Mary and We gave him the Gospel, and put gentleness and mercy in the heart of those who followed him. But they made up being monks, We did not mandate it to them, but (We mandated) looking for God's pleasure, but they did not observe it as it was supposed to be observed. Then we gave those among them who believed their reward, while most of them are disobedient

You who believe, be cautious of God and believe in His messenger, that He gives you a double portion of His mercy and makes a light for you to walk with it and forgives you. He is forgiving and merciful
So that people of the book know that they do not have a bit of power over God’s grace, and that the grace is in God’s hand, giving it to anyone He wants. God has enormous grace
